sentences.en: Macaroni and Cheese with Parmesan Cheese Topping , and Sage Gravy will appeal to their zesty personalities.
sentences.cn: 意大利的通心面、芝士和美味肉汁一定很合他们的口味.

sentences.en: This zesty and refreshing wine offers a freshly cut grass nose, herbaceous green bean.
sentences.cn: 这款爽口的葡萄酒引出绿豆般清新的香气.

words.tran_cn: 风趣的；有风味的；热心的，有热情的

trans.tran_cn: 引起极大的快乐或兴奋的，有兴趣的
